data.name: Drone Warfare
data.detailed_description:
Drone Warfare is an action focused flight sim set in the near future.

You are the remote pilot of the "H-BEE 01 Drone Prototype", a tiny military flying machine resembling a Honey Bee. The drone packs powerful weapons and advanced systems for the mission ahead.

Tasked with protecting the last honey bee colonies in a time where they are practically extinct, failure is not an option as depleting crops and widening food shortages are threatening the world's civilizations.

The H-BEE drone project is a last ditch attempt to protect what's left of the bee species.

Can the dire situation be reversed somehow? and what exactly caused the bees to disappear in the first place?

Features
  • Stunning environments for you to explore from an insect's eye view.
  • A diverse set of missions covering recon, defense, interception, and all out war!
  • Complex flight mechanics that can be adjusted to suit your playing style.
  • Deploy over-the-top weaponry and wreak havoc as you protect the bees from numerous adversaries and overwhelming odds.

  • OS: Windows 7 SP 1 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4690 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 970 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
